metadata.title: CVE-2019-19499 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Grafana <= 6.4.3 has an Arbitrary File Read vulnerability, which could beexploited by an authenticated attacker that has privileges to modify thedata source configurations.

criterions.comment: grafana: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
